mapper.insert: insert into medicalrecord (id, Case_Number, Register_Id, Medical_Readme, Medical_Present, Present_Treat, Medical_History, Medical_Allergy, Medical_Physique, Medical_Diagnosis, Medical_Handling, Case_State, DelMark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{caseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{medicalReadme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalPresent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{presentTreat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalHistory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalAllergy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalPhysique,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalDiagnosis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalHandling,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delmark,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update medicalrecord set Case_Number = #{caseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Register_Id = #{registerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Medical_Readme = #{medicalReadme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Medical_Present = #{medicalPresent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Present_Treat = #{presentTreat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Medical_History = #{medicalHistory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Medical_Allergy = #{medicalAllergy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Medical_Physique = #{medicalPhysique,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Medical_Diagnosis = #{medicalDiagnosis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Medical_Handling = #{medicalHandling,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Case_State = #{caseState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DelMark = #{delmark,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, Case_Number, Register_Id, Medical_Readme, Medical_Present, Present_Treat, Medical_History, Medical_Allergy, Medical_Physique, Medical_Diagnosis, Medical_Handling, Case_State, DelMark from medicalrecord where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
